data.name: BridgeDetectionPairing_Default_Tooltip
data.value: This will set the selected bridge as the default bridge.

data.name: BridgeDetectionPairing_DetectBridge_Tooltip
data.value: Detect your bridges using the philips hue portal and UPNP.

data.name: BridgeDetectionPairing_ListBridge
data.value: The following bridges have been found :

data.name: BridgeDetectionPairing_Pair_Tooltip
data.value: Begin the pairing procedure. You will have 60 seconds to press the link button on the bridge.

data.name: BridgeDetectionPairing_Scan_Tooltip
data.value: Scan all IP Addresses on your local network for a bridge.

data.name: DaylightForm_SunriseOffset_ToolTip
data.value: Offset in minutes of the sunrise. Use keyboard left right for more precision.

data.name: DaylightForm_SunsetOffset_ToolTip
data.value: Offset in minutes of the sunset. Use keyboard left right for more precision.

data.name: Form_HotKeyCreator_Generic_Tooltip
data.value: Will apply this preset to any selected light or group on trigger. Will not work with system wide hotkeys.

data.name: Form_HotKeyCreator_Warning_Generic
data.value: Generic hotkey will only work when an object is selected in the bridge. They will not work when called from outside WinHue.

data.name: GroupCreatorForm_HoldCtrl
data.value: * Hold control to select more than one light

data.name: HueTapSetupForm_TopMessage
data.value: Select a button to assign an action...

data.name: RuleCreatorForm_Message1
data.value: The maximum number of actions is 8 and the maximum number of conditions is 8.

data.name: RuleCreatorForm_Message2
data.value: The bridge can contain a maximum of 100 rules of 4 actions and 4 conditions.

data.name: RuleCreatorForm_Operator_ToolTip
data.value: eq : is Equal , gt : Greater than, lt : Lower than, dx : On change

data.name: SceneCreatorForm_Message
data.value: NOTE : V1 Scenes cannot be deleted from the bridge. When the maximum number of scenes has been reached the scene which has been used the least is recycled. Limitations are : 50 scenes per lamp / 200 scenes in the bridge.

data.name: SceneCreatorForm_Step3
data.value: STEP 3 : Chose one or more lights

data.name: ScheduleCreatorForm_Name_Tooltip
data.value: The Bridge will generate a new name if not specified.

data.name: SelectColorFromImageForm_Title
data.value: Select a color from an image...

data.name: SettingsForm_Tab_MainSettings_Controls_HiddenScenes_ToolTip
data.value: Checking this box will show the hidden scenes in the main view.

data.name: SettingsForm_Tab_MainSettings_Controls_LiveSliders_ToolTip
data.value: Checking this box will change the light/group state while sliding the slider.

data.name: SettingsForm_Tab_MainSettings_Debug_EnableDebug_ToolTip
data.value: Checking this box will allow WinHue 3 to output debugging information to a debug file.

data.name: SettingsForm_Tab_MainSettings_Network_DetectProxy_ToolTip
data.value: Checking this box will force WinHue 3 to detect local proxy and use it.

data.name: SettingsForm_Tab_Defaults_MinusOne
data.value: Set to -1 for default, Value x 100ms
